start_message_group:
Hello, I'm %s
I have a lot of cool features. To find out more, click on the button below and start a conversation with me.
donate_message: üí∏ Donate: Help keep the bot online, make a donation via PIX or PayPal. Pix Key and PayPal Email: ruizlenato@proton.me
help_message: Here are all my available functions. - /twitter [x/twitter username] ‚Äî Returns information from the specified Twitter/X account. - Send me a link to a tweet that contains some media (gifs, v√≠deos or photos) and I'll send the media contained in the tweet to you. > All these functions work in groups, you just need add me to your group.
language_menu_mesage: Current language: %s %s Select below the language you want to use the bot.
language_changed_successfully: The language has been changed successfully.
twitter_no_username: You forgot to specify the Twitter user name. Command usage: /twitter (twitter username)
twitter_invalid_username: The Twitter user could not be found, make sure you've typed the account's username correctly.
